profileText: a Representative from Oregon; born in Santa Clara County, Calif., April 7, 1968; graduated from Hanford High School, Hanford, Calif., 1986; B.B.A, California State University, Fresno, Calif., 1990; substitute teacher; sales representative; business owner; member of the Happy Valley, Oreg., city council, 2005-2010, president, 2007-2010; Mayor of Happy Valley, Oreg., 2011-2018; Delegate, Republican National Convention, 2020; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-January 3, 2025); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress in 2024; Secretary of Labor in the Cabinet of President Donald J. Trump, 2025-present.

asset.name: C001135_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
